projects.title: RFID-based Student Attendance Platform
projects.description: IoT-based campus attendance system using RFID and Computer Vision with QoE and accountability approach.
projects.longDescription: Developing an integrated campus attendance system based on AIoT (Artificial Intelligence of Things) with QoE (Quality of Experience) and accountability approach using RFID and Computer Vision technologies. This is a Penelitian Dosen Pemula project funded by Kemdiktisaintek.

projects.title: AI-based Proposal Checker Platform
projects.description: AI platform for checking and evaluating proposals.
projects.longDescription: Developed an AI-based platform that automatically checks and evaluates business proposals. The system uses NLP and machine learning to assess proposal quality and provide feedback.
projects.organization: Enclave Kolaborasi Global x Linxbrain Project

projects.title: Cat Care System Based on Internet of Things
projects.description: Internet of Things-based cat care system for automated pet monitoring and feeding.
projects.longDescription: Developed a comprehensive cat care system using Internet of Things technology for diploma final project. The system includes automated feeding, health monitoring, and environmental control. This project was published at ICEEI 2019 and received computer program copyright from Indonesia Ministry of Law.

projects.title: Enterprise Architect for Radio-B
projects.description: Designing an Enterprise Architect for Radio-B.
projects.longDescription: Designed comprehensive enterprise architecture for Radio-B, including business processes, information systems, and technology infrastructure alignment.

projects.title: Integrated Health Information System
projects.description: Designing integrated health information system for healthcare facilities.
projects.longDescription: Designed an integrated health information system covering patient management, medical records, and healthcare service delivery using multimedia system engineering principles.

projects.title: Web Information System for Siete Cafe
projects.description: Designing web-based information system for Siete Cafe.
projects.longDescription: Designed a web information system for Siete Cafe including menu management, order processing, and customer information system based on enterprise requirement analysis.

projects.title: Online Delivery System for Mulya Cirebon Chinese Food
projects.description: Designing online delivery system for Chinese food restaurant.
projects.longDescription: Designed an online food delivery system for Mulya Cirebon Chinese Food restaurant including order management, delivery tracking, and payment integration.
projects.organization: Information System and Technology Service Course

projects.title: Web-Based Hotel Reservation and Service System
projects.description: Develop web-based hotel reservation and service management system.
projects.longDescription: Developed a comprehensive web-based hotel reservation and service system including room booking, customer management, and service request handling using software engineering best practices.

projects.title: Student Monitoring System for Salman Al-Farisi Primary School
projects.description: Designing student monitoring and management system for primary school.
projects.longDescription: Designed a student monitoring system for Salman Al-Farisi Primary School including attendance tracking, grade management, and parent communication features.

projects.title: Online Booking System for Futsal Field Reservation
projects.description: Planning online booking system project for futsal field reservation.
projects.longDescription: Planned and designed an online booking system for futsal field reservation including scheduling, payment processing, and customer management using project management methodologies.

projects.title: Harvest Moon Game Replica with Java
projects.description: Develop replica of Harvest Moon game using Java programming.
projects.longDescription: Developed a replica of the popular Harvest Moon game using Java and object-oriented programming principles, including farming mechanics, character interactions, and resource management.

projects.title: Flight Database Management System
projects.description: Designing flight database management system for airline operations.
projects.longDescription: Designed a comprehensive flight database management system covering flight scheduling, passenger bookings, crew management, and aircraft maintenance using database modeling principles.
